name: Chris Hung
description: '''Hung Rong-hung''' ({{zh|t=洪榮宏}}; born 19 March 1963), also known by his English name '''Chris Hung''', is a Taiwanese ''[[enka]]'' and [[Hokkien pop]] singer and television host. Widely known as the "king of Taiwanese pop," he has won five [[Golden Melody Awards]] and one [[Golden Bell Award]].
